profile.description: A Software Engineer primarily focused on backend development, but comfortable working on frontend or other areas when needed. Performance matters to me (and I hope it does to you too). I have led projects from the ground up and built multiple internal libraries to streamline workflows. My skills span technologies such as TypeScript, Node.js, Go, and React. I'm motivated by tackling technical challenges and helping companies achieve their goals effectively.

footer.quote: I am available on almost all social networks. You can message me, I will reply to you within 24 hours. I can help you with Node.js, TypeScript, React, Software Architecture, CI / CD, Cloud, and Open Source Development.
